entry.title: I'll always come back home to you
entry.summary:
Author: IdoGeek

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 9,876Chapters: 8/55Kudos: 256

Summary: a collection of oneshots, so every chapter can be read as a standalone for the "established buddie, navy seal buck or army medic eddie, coming home suprise" trope. It is a work in progress. Total chapters may go up. It is the amount of prompts for this that I am working on right now.The works are mostly unedited. If I rework any chapters, it will be marked in the chapter title as "updated"If someone wants to use one of the oneshots as a prompt for a fanfiction, you are more than welcome to. I only ask that you put the work down as related work. Thanks.

entry.title: ACHOO!
entry.summary:
Author: paleredheadinascifi

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,195Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 53

Summary: “ACHOO!” Eddie sneezes.Christopher jumps, and, honestly, so does Eddie. It’s a hostile sneeze. Animalistic. It shakes him to his core.“Bless you!” A kind voice calls from the aether. Christopher blinks up at him, confused. Eddie shrugs.“…thank you!” He calls back. Or, Eddie cannot stop sneezing. The walls of his new complex must be really thin, because someone keeps saying "bless you".

entry.title: Where It's Safe
entry.summary:
Author: ClimbMeLikeaTreeMrBuckley

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 30,114Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 2

Summary: At Fort Benning, Eddie Diaz was stripped of more than his hair.Years later, at a barbershop in LA — and a man named Buck — might help him put the pieces back together.This isn't just about haircuts. It's about consent, kindness, and the long road back to yourself.—“Hair doesn’t care where it’s cut,” Buck said. “It’s where you feel the safest.”Eddie pressed the heels of his hands into his eyes.I’m okay. I’m safe.Buck is keeping me safe.

entry.title: Blue Pink White Pink Blue
entry.summary:
Author: Warlock_Nerd

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 13,642Chapters: 10/23Kudos: 252

Summary: Bobby noticed him first and went up to him. "Can I help you, young man?"The teenager shuffled forward. "I'm looking for Edmundo, Edmundo Diaz? He works here."Hearing his name, Eddie's brow furrowed. He stepped closer. At first, he didn't recognize the face. The sharp shape of the jaw, the curve of the mouth… then it clicked."Rachel?" He called, a question laced with surprise.The teenager straightened, "I go by Raphael now."***Eddie gets an unexpected visitor one day on shift, it’s his little cousin who needs a place to stay after getting kicked out by his parents :3 Just so everything is clear. This happens in an alternate universe where season 8 happened a lot differently. Bobby is alive and well, Eddie and Chris never went to Texas, the whole Kim Marisol thing never happened and Buck lives with Eddie due to the loft disappearing or something. (Shh. Don’t read too much into it.)Chris is 14.Enjoy :3

entry.title: I Didn’t Mean to Be Something I’m Not Supposed To, but I Am. I Am.
entry.summary:
Author: schrijverr

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 24,204Chapters: 6/23Kudos: 225

Summary: After everything Buck and Eddie have gone through together, the marriage that was once just convenience is now real. They’re boyfriend-husbands, trying to figure out what their life looks like now that they’re dating and learning to be an actual couple.However, trouble arises with the promised trip back home to El Paso for the summer. Eddie is not ready to come out to his parents and Buck supports him in that. Still, El Paso is not the place where either of them have been their best and tensions arise between them when having to exist in the influence sphere of the Diaz parents. Everything that has happened between them catches up as personal histories, insecurities and unresolved issues float back up to the surface. AKA: The terrible, horrible, no good, very bad El Paso trip where Buck and Eddie's marriage of convenience has become a secret relationship instead.

entry.title: The Ghost of You
entry.summary:
Author: bvddiebro

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 96,168Chapters: 17/21Kudos: 1,002

Summary: Evan "Buck" Buckley thought he had left his past behind when he traded his Navy fatigues for turnouts. For years, he’s buried the memories—of war zones, of a lost lover, of the life he swore he'd never return to. But with a series of arson attacks across LA, his past comes back to haunt him.NCIS are called to investigate and Buck’s carefully constructed web of secrets begins to crack when Sam Hanna arrives at Station 118—because Buck knows him. Sam was once his teammate, his mentor, his brother.When a grainy surveillance video reveals a face Buck thought he’d never see again, the ground shifts beneath his feet. Zack, the man he mourned, the man he watched die, is alive.Working alongside NCIS and his old SEAL Team, Buck finds himself walking a dangerous tightrope. The deeper he gets, the more he risks everything—his job, his family, his friendships and the life he’s built with Eddie and Christopher.But secrets can’t stay buried forever.

entry.title: Embers Between Us
entry.summary:
Author: Madforyou

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 15,296Chapters: 4/12Kudos: 127

Summary: The picture on the back is a dark tree line contrasted by the wide blue sky above it. ‘GEORGIA’ is written in big white letters across the top, the bottom saying “Welcome to Adventure.” It’s faded, like it has taken one too many trips in the back of a mail truck, tattered and worn.Eddie flips it over, the back scrawled with quick but somewhat neat handwriting—something personal. Scanning the words his eyes drop to the corner—the address.‘Maddie Kendall, 1500 Hemlock Ave, Hershey, PA 17033’What the hell?Or,An AU where Buck's postcards, which he sent to Maddie, were forwarded to Eddie on deployment by mistake through a Military Outreach Program. They become a reason for Eddie to hold on through the dark times, becoming attached to the man behind the letters and his stories of his travels. Until Buck's letters start getting sadder, wondering why his sister won't reply to him.

entry.title: What Were You Expecting?
entry.summary:
Author: chronicplaydate

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,116Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 61

Summary: Buck’s eyes were wide, mouth agape as he looked over Eddie from head to toe.“You don’t think–” he stopped, roaming eyes now stopping to stare at Eddie’s exposed stomach. “What if.. you are?”“Are what..?” Eddie’s brow furrowed as he followed Buck’s eyeline, looking down his own body.“Um, just.. I mean, you were just throwing up, isn’t that a symptom? Of being.. Pregnant?”Now, this is biologically impossible. And any other day, the thought wouldn’t have even crossed Buck’s mind, and Eddie definitely wouldn’t have believed it. But this night, they were just stupid enough, and just drunk enough, that they.. Forgot.-The fic where Buck and Eddie are stupid, drunk, and forget how biology works for a few hours.
